briefdescription.para: This should be private but is accessed from C, must be public.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *marCCDPort, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: marCCD

briefdescription.para: Constructor for marCCD driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
serverPort
The name of the asyn port driver previously created with drvAsynIPPortConfigure connected to the marccd_server program.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADBinX, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

memberdef.argsstring: (asynUser *pasynUser, char *strings[], int values[], int severities[], size_t nElements, size_t *nIn)
memberdef.name: readEnum

detaileddescription.para:
This method will open (1) or close (0) the shutter if ADShutterMode==ADShutterModeEPICS. Drivers will implement setShutter if they support ADShutterModeDetector. If ADShutterMode=ADShutterModeDetector they will control the shutter directly, else they will call this method.
open
1 (open) or 0 (closed)

Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: This should be private but is called from C, must be public.

detaileddescription.para: This thread controls acquisition, reads TIFF files to get the image data, and does the callbacks to send it to higher layers.

briefdescription.para: This should be private but is called from C, must be public.

detaileddescription.para: This task does the correction and file saving in the background, so that acquisition can be overlapped with these operations.

briefdescription.para: This function reads TIFF files using libTiff; it is not intended to be general, it is intended to read the TIFF files that marCCDServer creates.

detaileddescription.para: It checks to make sure that the creation time of the file is after a start time passed to it, to force it to wait for a new file to be created.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *output, char *input, size_t maxChars, double timeout)
memberdef.name: writeReadServer

briefdescription.para: This function acquires a single frame in "normal" mode, i.e.
This function acquires a series of images in triggered or timed series mode.
Driver for marCCD (Rayonix) CCD detector; communicates with the marCCD program over a TCP/IP socket with the marccd_server_socket program that they distribute.

detaileddescription.para: The marCCD program must be set into Acquire/Remote Control/Start to use this driver.
